title: Eldritch Knight
content: to scribe them into your spellbook from scrolls. Multiclassing an Eldritch Knight with a Barbarian is viable. You will be able to cast spells such as Enhanced Leap before entering Rage and retain it. The Barbarian rage only breaks concentration, so the Enhanced Leap will remain active for the entire duration.
